players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is the mafioso and he killed Diana. Trust me."
Charlie: "I believe Diana's death was an accident"
You: "I will not change my stance. Bob is the mafioso and he killed Diana intentionally."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob
